Texts.Eng: A personal computer station. I ain't the snoopin' kind.
Hmm... A highlighted message on the ssscreen. "Buy eggs after work".
It looks like a screen full of personnel memos.
Judging from these posts, humans simply bash their faces against the keyboard when arguing via computer.
Judging from this email account, someone's fallen victim to the well-known 'reply-all' faux pas. Poor guy.
Nosy. There's a message on the screen. "Let me explain to you why you are wrong..." The rest of the post descends into unintelligible ranting.
There's a message on the screen. "Dear Marjory. Please remember to put the cat out. Love David" Interesting.
There's a message on the screen. "The results of yesterday's toxicity tests were inconclusive. Please schedule more. Doctor Kleiner" Okay.
